name: In re Nomination Petition of Louise BISHOP 2460 N. 59th Street as Democratic Candidate for the Office of Representative in the General Assembly for the 192nd District. In re Objection of Carol Ann CAMPBELL
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Bishop
docket_number: Appeal No. 36 Middle District Appeal Docket 1990

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Louise BISHOP 2460 N. 59th Street as Democratic Candidate for the Office of Representative in the General Assembly for the 192nd District. In re Objection of Carol Ann CAMPBELL.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed. Opinion to follow.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
579 A.2d 860
In re Nomination Petition of Louise BISHOP 2460 N. 59th Street as Democratic Candidate for the Office of Representative in the General Assembly for the 192nd District. In re Objection of Carol Ann CAMPBELL.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 5, 1990.
Decided April 27, 1990.
Carole F. Kafrissen, for appellant.
Gregory Harvey, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
